originalText.text: They focus on socializing more than academics. It's  a diddy school but it's bad bc you get detention for the littlest things and you can tell them personal things and some teachers just don't  care and be disrespectful still. The dean Ms.Moye fails everybody for no reason.But the only good thing is that your kid will be safe.

originalText.text: This school has a lot of bullying. Some teachers are told about the bullying yet they ignore it. I was told by my child that she was getting bullied while the teacher was in the classroom, she tried to mention it to him but she got in trouble instead of the bullies.

originalText.text: Capital prep is the absolute worst....bullying comes from both teachers and children. But as soon as you complain they don’t believe you,  they tried to play like an educated school with their fancy uniforms...but it’s all fake and their specialty are detentions....IM GLAD I TOOK MY CHILD OUT THAT SCHOOL.

originalText.text: This is a very professional school. The matter of the fact is, bullying is a big problem. There was a kid that said he would pull out a gun and shoot a girl. The girl told the teacher and he said hands down. Something could of happened to that girl.

originalText.text: DO NOT UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES SEND YOUT CHILD TO THIS SCHOOL IT IS UNDERINVESTIGATION FOR VIOLATING STUDENTS AND PARENTS RIGHTS MR.PERRY HAS BEEN SUED THE LAWSUIT IS ONLINE AS PUBLIC RECORD I they are frauds their is no gym no after school activities no music or sports program & they have no connection to the boys & girls harbor and they cannot provide any counseling services your child may need BULLYING IS A MAJOR PROBLEM HERE AND THE TEACHERS TURN A BLIND EYE ALL THE TIME OCCASIONALLY BULLY STUDENTS AND PUT THEM DOWN DURING A CLASS ENTITLED "ALL SCHOOL" WHERE KIDS ARE ALLOWED INFRONT OF ALL THE OTHER STUDENTS TO EXPRESS WHY THEY DONT LIKE ANOTHER STUDENT THE TEACHERS DONT THINK OF WAYS FOR THOSE STUDENTS TO BOND TO AVOID PROBLEMS  THEY ADD BY SAYING THINGS LIKE "YOUR RIGHT HE DOES THINK HE KNOWS EVERYTHING" DO NOT MAKE THE MISTAKE I MADE
